user@localhost:~/test$ singularity storage create local name path
ID  Name  Type   Path  
1   name  local  path  

user@localhost:~/test$ singularity --verbose storage create local name path
ID  Name  CreatedAt            UpdatedAt            Type   Path  Config  
1   name  2023-04-05 06:07:08  2023-04-05 06:07:08  local  path  <nil>
